title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 488 - Civil Penalties And Interest On Underpayments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 488 - Civil Penalties And Interest On Underpayments

State Regulations
§ 488.1 - Failure to file a return or to pay the tax
§ 488.2 - Repealed
§ 488.3 - Failure to pay the tax due to fraud
§ 488.4 - Interest on underpayments
§ 488.5 - Unpaid tax, penalties and interest
§ 488.6 - Criminal penalties and other offenses

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 488

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 475, 509[7], 697[a], 1096 [a], 1142[1], [8], 1250, 1415[a], art. 21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
